🇬🇷💊🦠 Seemingly unaffected by the controversy in the global scientific community, Greece has resumed production of #chloroquine to treat cases of #coronavirus and is conducting clinical trials into the drug
https://t.co/B3WQkxTTG1 by @hecolliop for @AFP & @EUDataNewsHub https://t.co/oe8VlDoXfh
